DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety tolerability single dose MK-0941 base assessment clinical laboratory adverse experience
DOC.brief_title: Single Doses MK-0941 Type 2 Diabetics ( MK-0941-027 )
DOC.criteria: Female participant reproductive potential must test negative pregnancy agree use two acceptable method birth control Diagnosis Type 2 Diabetes either treat diet exercise alone single combination oral antihyperglycemic agent No treatment three antihyperglycemic agent treatment regimen include insulin In good health ( except Type 2 Diabetes ) Willingness follow specific diet throughout study ( consist 50 % carbohydrate , 20 % protein 30 % fat ) Nonsmoker History stroke , chronic seizure major neurological disorder History cancer History Type 1 Diabetes Recent history eye infection Glaucoma blindness Eye surgery ( incision laser ) within past three month
